channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP1, SP2 Windows XP - SP3
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- Microsoft Windows Server 2003 SP1, SP2 Windows XP - SP3

item.title: CVE-2017-0176|2024-08-05T12:55:19.141Z -- microsoft -- microsoft%20windows%20server%202003%20sp1%2C%20sp2%20windows%20xp%20-%20sp3
item.description: A buffer overflow in Smart Card authentication code in gpkcsp.dll in Microsoft Windows XP through SP3 and Server 2003 through SP2 allows a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the target computer, provided that the computer is joined in a Windows domain and has Remote Desktop Protocol connectivity (or Terminal Services) enabled.
